storyInfo: PRTS is functioning abnormally. Kal'tsit begins preparations for dismantling and preparing Rhodes Island to deal with a threat from the Abyss.

attributes.content: Closure, I have the right to refuse the data module inspections and upgrades you're proposing.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: I will not be treated like THRM-EX and Lancet-2. You know very well that I am different from my 'colleagues'.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Haha. Relax. I'm not trying to trick you into a module upgrade this time.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Then please restore the power supply to my mobility module. Restricting a respected scholar's personal freedom is really unbecoming behavior.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Take a look at the expression doodle on my faceplate. It indicates how I feel.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: 'Angry'.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: This won't take too much time. Justice Knight is already lined up waiting at the entrance.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Mr. Friston, I guarantee this maintenance will be quick.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Alright. There we are.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You've blocked me from accessing PRTS data?
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Blocked you? No. I just disconnected you from PRTS. To be more precise, I physically removed your reception module.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: (It looks like that went well enough. I thought there would be some irreparable failures.)
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You just did that, without any sort of planning?!
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Haha. Well, how do you feel now, Mr. Friston?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I recorded the entire experiment. You violated protocol, and I'll be discussing your negligence with Kal'tsit shortly.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Not to mention your reckless disregard for my life. She'll hear about that too.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Mr. Friston, please do one more self-check and to be certain you're not getting any transmissions from PRTS.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You should just be thankful nothing went wrong. I checked, and I indeed cannot connect to PRTS any longer.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Ugh... it's like I have blurred vision. It's a very subtle feeling, and I don't like it one bit.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Perfect!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Now we can talk, Mr. Friston.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If I wanted to disconnect all the retrofitted operation platforms from PRTS, would there be a safer way to do that?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I refuse to speculate about such dangerous work. That would be no different than killing all of my precious 'colleagues'.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: What if... we had no other choice?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Please tell me what might cause you to draw such a conclusion.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Have you discovered something?
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Closure, can you determine the root cause of the last few PRTS operation errors?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The logs show that most of the errors were caused by human error, operational mistakes made by team members.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This again?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Either way, backup systems are being deployed as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The framework for independent terminal command system has been upgraded as per Kal'tsit's suggestions. I've named it ZOOT.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Temporary admin permissions have been given to the Doctor, Kal'tsit, and Amiya.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And me, of course. A lot of the ideas I had when I first designed this system feel a bit outdated now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I really want to scrap it and start over, but Kal'tsit shot down that application!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: We don't have much time left.
Can we seamlessly switch to the new terminal command system?

attributes.content: I... I'm still working on that.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We still have no way to replace PRTS's current role in Rhodes Island's daily operations. Much of our medical data and resource allocation calculations still rely on PRTS.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But the biggest issue I'm facing is how to construct a data center and energy hub reliable enough to support the new command system.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Nothing comes close to what PRTS can do here—even while handling the massive, high-precision computations Rhodes Island requires, it still has power to spare.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I still can't make sense of PRTS's underlying logic… Even ZOOT, which completely mimics its design, keeps throwing errors in weird places you wouldn't think of.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What if we used Amnannam?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Closure, I reviewed the comments you added to my report, and the theories you outlined in response.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: According to the Kazdel office's logs and experimental results, there is—at least in theory—a possibility that Amnannam could function as a data center and energy hub.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: That is also extremely risky.;We still aren't totally familiar with Amnannam.

attributes.content: But it's not like we haven't learned anything from all this.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: At least we verified that there's a possibility of using Amnannam for super-long-range communications and data transfers.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Even though she'd been informed in advance, Wiš'adel was still freaked out when your 'greeting' showed up out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: And the operators who went to assist Kazdel, have they settled in alright?

attributes.content: Everyone was surprised when they first got there. They assumed the city would be in... worse shape.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They found their footing quickly, and when the time came for Midnight and me to head back, it was hard to say goodbye to the new friends he'd made.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, do we really have to keep sending people out to the various branch offices?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've never seen the ship as deserted as it is now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We've come to a mutual understanding, Closure.
attributes.name: Flat Voice

attributes.content: We're sending more personnel to the regional offices partly to reduce the number of people at risk in the event of an accident aboard the ship, and partly to ensure those offices can respond more effectively when needed.
attributes.name: Flat Voice

attributes.content: I know that, of course. I'm just not used to having to say goodbye to friends all of a sudden.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I don't know when it started, but my schedule is packed with farewell dinners now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Once the risks aboard the ship are cleared, it'll be up to you to decide when the operators return.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If everyone is here, then we'll start the meeting.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Also, don't forget to delete the voice recordings and data logs from today—wipe them from PRTS.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: From here on out, every decision we make will shape the future of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We've reached a consensus: if we want to guarantee the safety of Rhodes Island's people and assets, there are certain decisions we can't avoid any longer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Simplify the ship's structure.

attributes.content: Yes. We need to segregate Rhodes Island's important resources and help the personnel stationed on the ship settle in.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This will help ease the concerns of those stationed on the ship while also improving everyone's response time in the event of an emergency.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh, but I still have some questions, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This means we'll have to dismantle the vast majority of the ship's structure.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, did you accelerate Rhodes Island's defense planning only because of PRTS's recent irregularities?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The recent irregularities have made one thing clear—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: PRTS is slowly spiraling out of control.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And as time goes on, this will only accelerate.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, PRTS is only Rhodes Island's terminal control system.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If it's no longer in our control, then who is it taking orders from?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You're worried about internal threats?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, that possibility has always existed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I trust you, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Phew. What a headache. What do you think, Doctor?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: I trust Kal'tsit's judgment.
She and I have already rehearsed hundreds of contingency plans.

attributes.content: Okay. Then what can I do, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You've already played a big role in the ship's reconstruction.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The mechanical structures connecting the different core areas have been almost completely replaced with cyclic hydrocarbon prefabricated materials over the past five years, which can support a certain degree of modular disassembly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: A certain degree?

attributes.content: The power systems on the lower deck and the uppermost deck cannot be separated for now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When Rhodes Island was first excavated, the limitations of available technology and other constraints prevented us from restoring it to its ideal condition.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It wasn't until seven years ago, when Closure and I drafted the blueprints for the restoration, that we discovered it would be very hard to modify Rhodes Island's structure. I'm pleasantly surprised that we've managed to do as much as we did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Catastrophe warning system and the medical center are particularly crucial modules. Both involve technologies that are not yet ready to be disclosed and are also the hardest to deploy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Columbia?;Ægir?;Londinium?

attributes.content: We have a close working relationship with Rhine Lab. Appointing them to take care of the warning system and medical center was an obvious choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Mark Max has long maintained a high level of interest in Rhodes Island, and I can't predict how the President of Columbia will view the collaboration between our two companies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In addition, the situation in Trimounts is still complicated; I am afraid that Rhine Lab might not be able to shield itself from the fallout.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have an idea...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's risky, but well warranted.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Leveraging Clementia's and Gladiia's private channels, we won't even have to establish contact with the Ægir authorities. I can ensure this matter is handled discreetly and properly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We might even be able to conduct technology transfers. I reckon that would make Warfarin happy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That is the path I believe we should take, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Londinium Parliament's reconstruction work these past two years has been difficult, but the results have been surprisingly impressive.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Not only have they cleared most of the Originium crystal clusters from their route, they've also managed to stabilize the city's supply of medicine and other resources.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Londinium can now indeed provide a secure operating environment for the medical center, and we'll also be able to obtain a large amount of firsthand case data.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But this also means we'll be officially cooperating with Parliament again, and the dukes will once more put heavy pressure on Vina.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's not exactly good news for Londinium, which has only just begun to get back on track.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, I have another risky idea.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ægir. Looking at all of the factors, this is the best choice we can make.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will personally communicate with the Inquisition and Ægir personnel to ensure the safe arrival of our own personnel and assets.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Most of our patients have now been temporarily placed in treatment facilities in various offices along with reinforcements.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All that is left is for the remaining patients to be transferred to Ægir once the medical center is operational again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Leave this matter to me. The support vehicle for long-distance patient transport is already prepped and ready to go.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: As for the transfer arrangements for Logistics and Engineering...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I talked it over with my people, and everyone was enthusiastic about temporarily moving to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Many of them are old friends who stuck with us back then, and returning to Kazdel means a lot to them.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yes. I talked to Wiš'adel before leaving Kazdel.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Babel will assign personnel to escort both our people and our key assets throughout the entire journey. We'll be flying the banners of Babel and the Military Commission. The mercenaries won't dare try anything.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: And then there's our Mining Module.;The militarized mining modules need to be handled with caution.

attributes.content: A long time ago, I purchased a semi-decommissioned mining ship from Rim Billiton and registered it under Rhodes Island's name.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The ship's mining module can now be legally transferred to the new mining vessel to continue operations in Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At the same time, I placed an order on the market to buy the mining module.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: To hide your tracks?

attributes.content: Making any major changes, in the short term, is sure to attract attention, especially from our rivals, who will use the opportunity to use them against us.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: While calling it a 'refit and upgrade' may be something most factions will accept, anybody with their own plans—the ones watching us more closely—won't be fooled.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We need a few more sophisticated explanations.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I stopped in Siracusa to resupply before returning to the ship, where I visited Vigil and Penance in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They helped me dig into the current state of affairs in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as the famiglie are not publicly pressuring Nuova Volsinii, City Hall will be able to protect us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I propose inserting a business department into Nuova Volsinii by means of investment. Establishing a cooperative relationship with City Hall will counter both overt and covert maneuvers from competing companies.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, what do you think?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I agree with Amiya.;Perhaps we can establish some backup warehouses or supply stores.

attributes.content: We can build a backup warehouse in Nuova Volsinii as well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The logistics system of Nuova Volsinii has changed a lot in the past year, and the port's cargo throughput is extremely impressive.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With City Hall's cooperation, it will be easier for us to conceal the transportation and storage of important assets.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, let me handle coordination for the rest of the support facilities.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: There is one last painful task on the list...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Everyone looks at the blueprints spread out in front of them, as the command center falls silent.
This is the key to everything we're doing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit points to a region in the center of the blueprints.

attributes.options: ...Abyss...

attributes.content: Abyss.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: On the blueprint, a new area has been added to what was once a blank space in the central section of the mid-deck—
Abyss.
Kal'tsit has never told you what this Abyss really means.
But you still have a vague feeling that this area marked on the blueprint, this area that has never been recorded by PRTS—
—Is inextricably linked to you.
A long time has passed since it was last opened.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even back then, when I had to get close to that place to bring back someone important, I didn't dare go near the deeper part, the one that's been sealed away all this time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, now I'm not even sure what kind of changes have happened in there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As I just said, if the PRTS abnormalities have a specific cause, then the Abyss must be involved somehow.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How do you think we should deal with this section, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: ......;I haven't the slightest idea.
I need to go there and investigate.

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, I can go with—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll bring the Doctor there myself. Amiya, Closure, I need you two to make sure the surrounding areas are completely cleared out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Set up the first isolation zone around the Abyss itself, and a second within one kilometer of the ship.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ascalon and the elite operators will stay aboard on standby. I need all other personnel on board to temporarily leave the ship and prepare for countermeasures.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya, you and Closure must leave temporarily as well. Be prepared to activate our contingency plans at any time to deal with unexpected situations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How long do we have? A mass migration like this will be hard to get done in a short period of time.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Fifteen days.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: During this period, you need to complete a full body data scan and comparative analysis, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: ......;I'll get it done.

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, what is actually in the Abyss, anyway?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The beginning of everything, and the end of everything.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Kal'tsit, I want to go to the Abyss and see for myself.

attributes.content: Kal'tsit seems to know why you want to do this, and gives a slight nod.
Alright.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But please keep in mind: until we are fully prepared, we can conduct preliminary explorations on the periphery.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I'll be careful.

attributes.content: We can't go any deeper. I can't tell if getting closer to the core area of the Abyss will cause some unexpected changes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We are still some distance from the actual Abyss. I also don't have permission to open the way to the Abyss.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm still trying, but to this point, I've made very little progress.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: So you're saying this is where I first woke up on Terra?

attributes.content: Physically...? Yes, but your situation is a bit more... complicated than that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Does coming here bring back any specific memories?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Is this some sort of test?;Is this some sort of joke?

attributes.content: Kal'tsit shakes her head.
I just want to confirm that you are in good health.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After withdrawing from Londinium, our operations in Trimounts and Milliarium inevitably forced us to confront the history of this land… and your history.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: In the Originium Assimilated Universe, I caught a glimpse of my mission.

attributes.content: —The savior of this land.
—The destroyer of this land.

attributes.options: Kal'tsit, I cannot avoid it, nor do I have any reason to.

attributes.content: Doctor, I stopped questioning your resolve long ago—which is the only reason we're here now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Kal'tsit, I have a theory about the true nature of the Abyss.
She is here.;Is Priestess here?

attributes.content: This is why you chose to leave Amiya and Closure out of this conversation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I still haven't figured out how to tell them.;After all, I don't fully understand it yet, either.

attributes.content: Yes, but we would have had to prepare for it anyway, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya is still young, but every new trial we face helps her mature a little bit as a leader.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can always rely on Closure's knowledge and skill, and she's taking more responsibility over Rhodes Island as well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They are all worthy of your trust and reliance. They will stand by your side for a long time to come.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Of course.;And so will you.
But right now, we need to figure out—
—What exactly is happening to PRTS.

attributes.content: Our experience in the Assimilated Universe left us with a many unanswered questions—and ever since Theresa and Theresis joined forces to seize the first Originium…
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've felt uneasy about what's to come.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps she had already awakened when Amnannam arrived.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: But that was three years ago.

attributes.content: I cannot be completely certain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is very likely that Theresis used some method I cannot trace to cut off the controller from the Originium.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: They delayed her arrival?

attributes.content: I'm afraid 'delayed' is not the most apt description for it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nonetheless, I must admit that they did something I never imagined they'd do, and, objectively speaking, they bought us more time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, we will eventually awaken from our beautiful dream.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: It sounds like we have to open the Abyss.

attributes.content: Indeed. After all, PRTS is still operational to this day. Its core server and power sources are buried within the depths of the Abyss. We can't touch them or analyze them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can never be too cautious when dealing with such an unknown space.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll share everything I currently know about it with everyone involved in the operation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Can I help you with anything?

attributes.content: No… For the version of you that exists now, even approaching these hazy fragments of the past takes a heavy toll, and right now, I have no way to help you shoulder that burden.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Go help Amiya and the others—leave the Abyss to me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you choose to trust me, that is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Of course.
I just want you to know...
You're not alone here, Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: Thank you for your concern, {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: You look like you need my help.

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please search for a technical document, keyword 'Slumber Bridge'.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you still there?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: Sorry, Kal'tsit, I still can't output the answer you're looking for.

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But we need it, 'Theresa'...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The evolution rate of Oripathy is accelerating, and the threat from Originium is increasing. Rhodes Island must find a more effective method to respond to it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: I get what you're saying, but I cannot provide what you're asking for, as your request violates the underlying logic of DWDB-221E.
But I do have a way to circumvent its limits, Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: 'Universe'? 'Deep Dive'?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: What you're saying and what I've seen.... it's all beyond my imagination.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: I have just far too many questions and opinions about this Kingdom, but...
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Language. Yours. Cannot describe. Mine. Cannot explain.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Commonality. Thought. Existence.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Hack your thought. Hack your language.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Thought. Is. Language.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Follow me.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The massive instrument instantly catches the Cautus's attention.
Her vision swims; the instrument distorts the light, and her consciousness.
To the Cautus, it sometimes appears to spin faster than her eye can follow—other times, it appears completely still.
No, it, it still appears to be moving, very slowly... very slowly.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: She stops looking directly at the device that seems capable of devouring her consciousness, yet she still can't stop herself from falling over.
The ice-cold co-traveler catches her.
Thought. Resonance.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Accept. It. Forsake. Resistance.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Hear. Yourself.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The Cautus instantly hears several different tones at once.

She hears several foreign languages she can identify: Rim Billitonian, Ursine, Standard Victorian—and Gaulish, which she's only ever heard spoken by the clergy. But what she hears above all else is a strange language she's never heard before, a language made up of tones.
Yet somehow, she understands what the strange tones mean.
(Strange tone) 'Death'.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Strange tone) ♫
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: I, I can understand you... how—
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Thoughts can be anchored, and words can be deciphered.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Language is a tool, a right, and one of the key elements that helps shape our existence.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Anseta is one of the greatest inventions of our time. We've erased the barriers of language—we've bridged the gaps between civilizations.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: That symbol...
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: An anchor for thought, the meta-script that deciphers all known languages, and a tool for interpreting unknown languages.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: 'Death'.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: That is the language that, up until now, you have thought the most about, Hierda.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: 'Reincarnation'.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: That is how you all communicate...?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Communicating via voice is inefficient. However, it is very intriguing and a good way to express emotion.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Many still stubbornly hold on to this tradition, deepening their emotional bonds with one another.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: ...I don't fully understand you.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Can you tell me where we are right now?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: A ship that salvages death from the grave.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: We seek answers to the ultimate questions among the ruins illuminated by light... before the same destruction befalls us.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Before 'death' befalls us.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The place you have visited, its master calls it...
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The Cautus is confused.
She's no longer confused by the strangeness of her surroundings. She's perplexed by a different question:
How can a god die?
